bibl.bibl: Scott, John. 1870–4. Notes on horticulture in Bengal. 1. Gerniaceace–the cranes-bill order. 2. Loranthacæ–the mistleto order, their germination and mode of attachment. 3. Orchidaceae–the orchid order. Journal of the Agricultural and Horticultural Society of India 2 (1870): 241–57, 257–96; 3 (1874): 1–82.
